Romanian Fashion Week: parisian buyers on a scouting mission
A delegation of six Paris-based buyers, representing renowned department stores, concept boutiques, and consulting firms, travelled to Iași, Romania, for the 25th edition of Romanian Fashion Week. Their mission: to explore the country's creative potential. Invited by the festival’s organisers, the buyers – Asano Miyazaki and Akane Tsuchihashi...

news.title: MemberBusinessG-III reports ‘solid’ quarterly figures and withdraws earnings forecastUS-based fashion conglomerate G-III Apparel Group Ltd. reported a decline in revenue for the first quarter of its 2025/26 financial year, in line with expectations. Fashion Chaco launches collaborative collection with Marley familyFootwear brand Chaco has partnered with the Marley family to launch a limited-edition collection inspired by the legendary Bob Marley. The new collaboration aims to pay tribute to the late Bob Marley's timeless message of love, unity, and shared humanity, translating his ethos into designs that invite purposeful movement. RetailFrasers Group expands retail presence with Store in DundeeFrasers Group is opening a new store in Dundee The British retail giant has opened a new store in the Frasers-owned Overgate Shopping Centre, the Group revealed on Friday. Retail|In Pictures JW PEI opens first pop-up store in NYC & debuts ready-to-wear lineLos Angeles-based fashion brand JW PEI has opened its first-ever pop-up store in New York City. Located at 42 Crosby Street in Soho, the pop-up opens on June 6 and marks the brand’s retail debut in New York City as well as the official launch of its first-ever ready-to-wear collection.
